attributes.action: review the status of the Probation Serice within NOMS giving it equal status in practice as the Prison service is given and to therefore adequately fund and resource this vital element of the Criminal Justice system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my belief that despite so called government figures Probation as the National Audit Office stated in 2008 is woefully under funded and resourced and stretched beyond capacity.  NOMS has and is reducing the status of Probation and marginalising the service putting the public at serious risk and preventing the adequate rehabilitation of offenders
